snippet: Carmen M. Ortiz, the United States attorney for Massachusetts, announced an investigation on Wednesday into alleged civil rights violations at the prestigious Boston Latin School.
abstract: Carmen M Ortiz, United States attorney for Massachusetts, announces investigation into alleged civil rights violations at Boston Latin School; previous investigation revealed administrators violated internal policy regarding race, prompting civil rights organizations to urge Ortiz to take action.
lead_paragraph: Carmen M. Ortiz, the United States attorney for Massachusetts, announced an investigation on Wednesday into alleged civil rights violations at the prestigious Boston Latin School.

headline.main: Massachusetts: U.S. Inquiry Begins at Boston Latin
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: U.S. Inquiry Begins at Boston Latin
